attributes.review: I wanted to get updates on President Trumps campaign, and figured having an app that kept me in the loop would be the perfect way to get the job done.  Little did I know that the app actually installs a virus on your phone that gets access to all your personal info.  As time went on the virus began spamming my texts/email etc.  I was getting up to 100 notifications a DAY.  I REPEAT TO NOT INSTALL.
